data.text: @LindaMerrick18 @nbcoffice Well Aunt Linda... that’s why we are able to have a fun, open, intelligent conversation on ALL things & not just discuss the weather! Vaccines have been around for awhile and have been shown to work...not just #experimental

@ginshea @nbcoffice Vaccinated and feeling great!   I thank God for the scientist who save humanity.  Problem is there are still skeptics out there.  I ask them, what about polio, german measles, smallpox, diphtheria, etc.?
